markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fox Trick](/Feats.aspx?ID=2627) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kitsune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=341" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

</column>

---

You always have time for a joke or prank. You [Create a Diversion](/Actions.aspx?ID=45), [Conceal an Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=61), or [Hide](/Actions.aspx?ID=62). All creatures who witnessed your Fox Trick then wise up to it, becoming temporarily immune to your Fox Trick for 24 hours.
name: Fox Trick
